name: Up the River Gob
description:
* If the music isn't playing once Jarri is on the river click inside the window with the pointer.

DESCRIPTION

Jarri the Longest Night gnome needs help on his annual trip up The River Gob collecting litter as he goes. Tonight is Longest Night Feast and the goblins are waiting to fill their bellies with Jarri's best trash.

Collect at least 10 old boots, 10 old bottles, and 10 old tires, to reach the end and take part in the feast.

This game was made for Zeno Jam 6 with the theme "going up."

CONTROLS

Currently no touch controls

Use the arrow keys or WASD to move Jarri around. Collect boots, bottles, and tires by running into them. Be sure to dodge the rocks, birds, and bird poop.
